title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 4, pt. 39 - Acquisition Of Capital Stock Or Bonds Of Gas, Electric, Steam, Waterworks, Telegraph And Telephone Corporations
content:

§ 39.1 - Contents of petition

§ 39.3 - Radio-telephone utilities and resellers of telephone services

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 4, pt. 39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
